marketing information: ViewSonic's 22-inch VA2232wm-LED displays are new members of the VA series; with a native 1680 x 1050 resolution and sRGB color calibration function, the two models present exquisite picture quality and an immersive viewing experience. Along with an impressive 10,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2232wm-LED automatically detect and adjust dark and bright levels to greatly enhance grayscale and color contrast performance. Save energy and money with ViewSonic's ECO Mode solution which reduces power consumption and extends backlight life. The VA2232wm-LED provide great value concerning viewing performance and are excellent solutions for home and business.
